p.em: Because education is your ticket to ride in life!!

div.p: Our school was expressly established to serve a specific type of student, one whose previous academic performance was the direct result of poor attendance, behavior problems and academic deficiencies. To help these students begin to redirect their lives, New Academy Charter School pioneered a ground-breaking new school environment designed to change the very foundations of how these young people—and even their parents and their communities—view academic success.

div.h4: Begin your career at New Academy Charter School and be a part of our success
div.p: New Academy Charter School is continuously seeking enthusiastic, dedicated teachers and support staff who possess the ability to inspire our students.
New Academy Charter School offers full-time positions for:
At The Academy Schools, our people are our most valuable resource and the cornerstone of our success.

In addition to competitive compensation, all full-time positions include paid vacation and sick time and a comprehensive benefits package which includes medical, dental, vision and prescription coverage, as well as long-term disability coverage, life insurance and a 401k plan.
If you have the desire to dedicate your talents to improving the lives of at-risk youth, click here, to learn more about career opportunities currently available.
